media.headline: Ellsbury's leaping grab
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Ellsbury makes a leaping catch at the wall
media.bigblurb: Jacoby Ellsbury ranges back to deep center field and makes a leaping grab at the wall, robbing Rickie Weeks Jr. of an extra-base hit

media.headline: Torreyes' two-run home run
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Torreyes blasts a two-run homer to left field
media.bigblurb: Ronald Torreyes hammers a two-run shot to left field in the top of the 3rd inning, giving the Yankees an early 2-0 lead

media.headline: Holliday's towering RBI double
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Holliday gets RBI after ball lost in roof
media.bigblurb: Matt Holliday launches a towering fly ball to left that Peter Bourjos has trouble locating in the roof, and it drops for an RBI double

media.team: Tampa Bay Rays New York Yankees
media.headline: Torreyes throws out Robertson
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Torreyes gets Robertson after call overturned
media.bigblurb: Daniel Robertson reaches first base on a throwing error by Ronald Torreyes, but the Yankees challenge and the call is overturned in the 3rd

media.headline: Headley's tough backhanded snag
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Headley makes a difficult backhanded stab
media.bigblurb: Chase Headley makes a difficult backhanded stab on a line drive off the bat of Peter Bourjos, robbing him of a base hit

media.headline: Torreyes' barehanded play
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Torreyes makes smooth barehanded play
media.bigblurb: Ronald Torreyes charges a slow chopper off the bat of Steven Souza Jr., barehands it and fires to first base to end the inning

media.headline: Odorizzi K's Sanchez
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Odorizzi strikes out Sanchez swinging
media.bigblurb: Jake Odorizzi fans Gary Sanchez on a 3-2 pitch to record the first out of the top of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Headley's solo home run
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Headley launches a solo homer to center field
media.bigblurb: Chase Headley drives a solo home run to dead-center field in the top of the 6th inning, extending the Yankees' lead to 4-0

media.headline: Headley's RBI single
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Headley grounds an RBI single into left field
media.bigblurb: Chase Headley grounds an RBI single away from the shift and through the vacated left side of the infield, extending the Yankees' lead to 5-0

media.headline: Diaz K's Gardner
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Diaz strikes out Gardner looking
media.bigblurb: Jumbo Diaz catches Brett Gardner looking to start the top of the 7th inning

media.headline: Longoria's single to right
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Longoria rips a single into right field
media.bigblurb: Evan Longoria lines a hard single into right field in the bottom of the 1st inning, the Rays' first hit of the game

media.headline: Castro's tough spinning play
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Castro makes a spinning stop and throw
media.bigblurb: Starlin Castro ranges into the hole, makes the tough stop, spins and throws to first base to complete the out

media.headline: Betances works out of trouble
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Betances escapes a bases-loaded jam
media.bigblurb: With the bases loaded, Dellin Betances gets Logan Morrison to bounce out to first base to end the inning

media.headline: Yankees flash the leather in win
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Yankees put on a defensive clinic
media.bigblurb: The Yankees' defense puts on a strong collective performance in the team's 5-0 victory over the Rays

media.headline: Chapman seals the victory
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Chapman seals win in return to Yankees
media.bigblurb: Aroldis Chapman records three outs to secure the Yankees' 5-0 victory in his return to the Bronx Bombers

media.headline: Sabathia tosses five scoreless
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Sabathia pitches five shutout innings in win
media.bigblurb: CC Sabathia allows only three hits over five shutout innings to pick up his first win of the season

media.headline: Torreyes on his two-run home run
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Torreyes discusses his two-run home run
media.bigblurb: Ronald Torreyes talks about his two-run home run in the third inning that opened the scoring for the Yankees in their 5-0 win over Tampa Bay

media.headline: CC, Headley on win over Rays
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Sabathia, Headley on Yankees' first win
media.bigblurb: CC Sabathia and Chase Headley discuss their performances in the Yankees' 5-0 win over the Rays

media.headline: Girardi on win over Rays
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Girardi on Sabathia's scoreless outing
media.bigblurb: Yankees manager Joe Girardi discusses CC Sabathia's start and the challenge of replacing Didi Gregorius' production after the team's win

media.headline: Recap: NYY 5, TB 0
media.blurb: 4/4/17: Sabathia leads the Yankees to their first win
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: CC Sabathia tossed five strong innings while Ronald Torreyes and Chase Headley drove in four of the Yankees' five runs

media.headline: Cash on loss to Yankees
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Cash on shutout loss to Yankees
media.bigblurb: Rays manager Kevin Cash discusses the his team's 5-0 loss to the Yankees, the pitching of Jake Odorizzi and the bullpen's performance

media.headline: 4/4/17 CG: NYY@TB
media.blurb: 4/4/17 Condensed Game: NYY@TB
media.bigblurb: 4/4/17 Condensed Game: NYY@TB
